modName: Koala's Touch v2 - UUNP Bodyslide Preset
summary: A.K.A UNP2SB V2 - Eye candy and immersion friendly
descriptionHtml:
[b]

[color=#ff0000][center][/center][/color][/b][center][b][color=#ff0000]WARNING! NUDITY!!![/color][/b]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59562/?]CBBE Version 1 (outdated)[/url][/center]
This my Bodyslide SliderPreset .xlm file.

Eye candy and immersion friendly. 

The mod is HDT/non-HDT compatible. 

Includes Nude and Clothed presets. 

[u][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#f1c232][b]INSTALATION[/b][/color][/font][/u]

Copy the .xlm files to your .../Skyrim/Data/CalienteTools/BodySlide/SliderPresets

[color=#f1c232][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][b]REQUIERMENTS[/b][/u][b] [/b][/font]
[/color]
UUNP Body (there is no mod file for UUNP, you build the body directly with Bodyslide using a preset and after installing body textures) 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?] BodySlide 2[/url] -> INSTALL ALL UUNP BODIES SLIDERS (7B Cup, UNP Perky, etc....) OR IT WON'T LOOK AS INTENDED!!!
Any UNP-like textures+normalmaps  (7B, UNPB, etc ...)

[u][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#f1c232][b]RECOMMENDED MODS[/b][/color][/font][/u] (All used in screenshots)

[color=#6fa8dc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin[/url][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]Groovtama's XPMS Extended
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extentions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601]Realistic Ragdolls and Force
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69886/?][color=#6d9eeb]Skyrim Enhanced UUNP Bodyslide[/color][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48730/?]Skylight ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46925/?]Tamriel Reloaded[/url]

[center][b][color=#6aa84f][size=4]



FAQ[/size][/color]



[/b][color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : Is this a body replacer?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : No, it is a BodySlide preset, that's why you need BodySlide. 

[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : Any armor replacer?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : Skimpy : [color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69562/?]Remodeled armor for UUNP with Bodyslide[/url][/color]
Non-Skimpy : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69886/?][color=#1e84cc] [/color][color=#6d9eeb]Skyrim Enhanced UUNP Bodyslide[/color][/url][color=#6d9eeb] (Recommended)[/color]

[color=#6aa84f]Q[/color] : I don't like this, can you ... ?
[color=#ffe599]A[/color] : No you can do it yourself with BodySlide, it's easy. [/center]
[i][u]


[color=#d5a6bd][size=4]NEW WITH BODYSLIDE?[/size][/color][/u][/i]


- Open BodySlide
- Choose 'UUNP - Koala's Touch' in Presets
- In Outfit/Body, you are going to chose on which body (determines if HDT or TBBP or none) or armor you want to apply the preset. 
- Press 'Build' to apply it on the selected Outfit/Body or 'Patch Build' to apply it on many. 
- Use 'Nude' preset to build body (hands/feet included) and 'Cloths And Armors' to batch build equipement. 



[color=#f1c232]Hope you enjoy![/color]
[color=#e06666]

CREDITS : Thanks to Caliente for BodySlide. 
[/color]
author: makounen60
